definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: I want to buy a sextant .
What can you use the Sextant of the Sea Elves for?
sentences.chinese: 海精靈的六分儀有什麼效用？

sentences.english: The sextant is hard to use.
A navigator also had to know how to use a complex instrument called a sextant.
sentences.chinese: 導航器還必須知道如何使用複雜的儀器稱爲六分儀。

sentences.english: Other early instruments included the sextant and the astrolabe.
sentences.chinese: 另外的早期儀器還有六分儀和星盤。
